about_the_game:
Platform stealthfully through Webcott and gain the advantage in turn-based combat by finding ways to separate your foes! Time your attacks and defend your friends as you fight your way into this subterranean, under-siege village!



Navigate Webcott with companion abilities, such as Absko's web swinging and wall climbing!


Battling lots of enemies all at once isn't great for your companions, especially since you'll have limited chances to heal. However, using the environment and your companion's abilities, you can separate enemies to gain an advantage in fights before they even begin!



Beat up your foes through turn-based combat and master the timing of action commands throughout combat to enhance both your offense and defense!



Defend weakened companions during enemy attacks with other companions to help them last longer in fights!


Exploring, talking to inhabitants, and winning fights gives companions ideas on new abilities and moves called inspirations, which can be equipped with points gained from leveling up!

name: Webcott Dungeon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
